   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Tests of application_opt() request_errors. There's some overlap
   23: %% between this suite and the traffic suite but latter exercises more
   24: %% config.
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: -module(diameter_3xxx_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: %% testcases, no common_test dependency
   30: -export([run/0,
   31:          run/1]).
   32: 
   33: %% common_test wrapping
   34: -export([
   35:          %% Framework functions
   36:          suite/0,
   37:          all/0,
   38:          init_per_suite/1,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          
   41:          %% The test cases
   42:          traffic/1
   43:         ]).
   44: 
   45: %% internal
   46: -export([send_unknown_application/1,
   47:          send_unknown_command/1,
   48:          send_ok/1,
   49:          send_invalid_hdr_bits/1,
   50:          send_missing_avp/1,
   51:          send_ignore_missing_avp/1,
   52:          send_5xxx_missing_avp/1,
   53:          send_double_error/1,
   54:          send_3xxx/1,
   55:          send_5xxx/1]).
   56: 
   57: %% diameter callbacks
   58: -export([peer_up/3,
   59:          peer_down/3,
   60:          pick_peer/5,
   61:          prepare_request/4,
   62:          handle_answer/5,
   63:          handle_error/5,
   64:          handle_request/3]).
   65: 
   66: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter.hrl").
   67: -include_lib("diameter/include/diameter_gen_base_rfc6733.hrl").
   68: %% Use the fact that STR/STA is identical in RFC's 3588 and 6733.
   69: 
   70: -include("diameter_util.hrl").
   71: 
   72: 
   73: %% ===========================================================================
   74: 
   75: -define(testcase(), get(?MODULE)).
   76: 
   77: -define(L, atom_to_list).
   78: -define(A, list_to_atom).
   79: 
   80: -define(CLIENT, "CLIENT").
   81: -define(SERVER, "SERVER").
   82: -define(REALM, "erlang.org").
   83: -define(HOST(Host, Realm), Host ++ [$.|Realm]).
   84: 
   85: -define(ERRORS, [answer, answer_3xxx, callback]).
   86: -define(RFCS, [rfc3588, rfc6733]).
   87: -define(DICT(RFC), ?A("diameter_gen_base_" ++ ?L(RFC))).
   88: -define(DICT, ?DICT(rfc6733)).
   89: 
   90: -define(COMMON, ?DIAMETER_APP_ID_COMMON).
   91: 
   92: %% Config for diameter:start_service/2.
   93: -define(SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC),
   94:         [{'Origin-Host', Name ++ "." ++ ?REALM},
   95:          {'Origin-Realm', ?REALM},
   96:          {'Host-IP-Address', [{127,0,0,1}]},
   97:          {'Vendor-Id', 12345},
   98:          {'Product-Name', "OTP/diameter"},
   99:          {'Auth-Application-Id', [?COMMON]},
  100:          {application, [{dictionary, ?DICT(RFC)},
  101:                         {module, ?MODULE},
  102:                         {answer_errors, callback},
  103:                         {request_errors, Errors}]}]).
  104: 
  105: -define(LOGOUT, ?'DIAMETER_BASE_TERMINATION-CAUSE_LOGOUT').
  106: 
  107: -define(XL(F),    ?XL(F, [])).
  108: -define(XL(F, A), ?LOG("D3XS", F, A)).
  109: 
  110: 
  111: %% ===========================================================================
  112: 
  113: suite() ->
  114:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 90}}].
  115: 
  116: all() ->
  117:     [traffic].
  118: 
  119: 
  120: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  121:     ?DUTIL:init_per_suite(Config).
  122: 
  123: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  124:     ?DUTIL:end_per_suite(Config).
  125: 
  126: 
  127: traffic(_Config) ->
  128:     ?XL("traffic -> entry"),
  129:     run().
  130: 
  131: 
  132: %% ===========================================================================
  133: 
  134: tc() ->
  135:     [send_unknown_application,
  136:      send_unknown_command,
  137:      send_ok,
  138:      send_invalid_hdr_bits,
  139:      send_missing_avp,
  140:      send_ignore_missing_avp,
  141:      send_5xxx_missing_avp,
  142:      send_double_error,
  143:      send_3xxx,
  144:      send_5xxx].
  145: 
  146: %% run/0
  147: 
  148: run() ->
  149:     ?XL("run -> entry"),
  150:     ?RUN([[{{?MODULE, run, [{E,D}]}, 60000} || E <- ?ERRORS,
  151:                                                D <- ?RFCS]]).
  152: 
  153: %% run/1
  154: 
  155: run({F, [_,_] = G}) ->
  156:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  157:         "~n   F: ~p"
  158:         "~n   G: ~p", [F, G]),    
  159:     put(?MODULE, F),
  160:     apply(?MODULE, F, [G]);
  161: 
  162: run({E,D}) ->
  163:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  164:         "~n   E: ~p"
  165:         "~n   D: ~p", [E, D]),
  166:     try
  167:         run([E,D])
  168:     after
  169:         ?XL("run(after) -> stop diameter app"),
  170:         ok = diameter:stop()
  171:     end;
  172: 
  173: run([Errors, RFC] = G) ->
  174:     ?XL("run -> entry with"
  175:         "~n   Errors: ~p"
  176:         "~n   RFC:    ~p", [Errors, RFC]),
  177:     Name = ?L(Errors) ++ "," ++ ?L(RFC),
  178:     ?XL("run -> start diameter app"),
  179:     ok = diameter:start(),
  180:     ?XL("run -> start service 'server' (~p)", [Name]),
  181:     ok = diameter:start_service(?SERVER, ?SERVICE(Name, Errors, RFC)),
  182:     ?XL("run -> start service 'client'"),
  183:     ok = diameter:start_service(?CLIENT, ?SERVICE(?CLIENT,
  184:                                                   callback,
  185:                                                   rfc6733)),
  186:     ?XL("run -> (server) listen"),
  187:     LRef = ?LISTEN(?SERVER, tcp),
  188:     ?XL("run -> (client) connect"),
  189:     ?CONNECT(?CLIENT, tcp, LRef),
  190:     ?XL("run -> run"),
  191:     ?RUN([{?MODULE, run, [{F,G}]} || F <- tc()]),
  192:     ?XL("run -> \"check\" counters"),
  193:     _ = counters(G),
  194:     ?XL("run -> remove 'client' transport"),
  195:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?CLIENT, true),
  196:     ?XL("run -> remove 'server' transport"),
  197:     ok = diameter:remove_transport(?SERVER, true),
  198:     ?XL("run -> stop service 'server'"),
  199:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?SERVER),
  200:     ?XL("run -> stop service 'client'"),
  201:     ok = diameter:stop_service(?CLIENT),
  202:     ?XL("run -> done"),
  203:     ok.
  204: 
  205: %% counters/1
  206: %%
  207: %% Check that counters are as expected.
  208: 
  209: counters([_Errors, _RFC] = G) ->
  210:     [] = ?RUN([[fun counters/3, K, S, G]
  211:                     || K <- [statistics, transport, connections],
  212:                        S <- [?CLIENT, ?SERVER]]).
  213: 
  214: counters(Key, Svc, Group) ->
  215:     counters(Key, Svc, Group, [_|_] = diameter:service_info(Svc, Key)).
  216: 
  217: counters(statistics, Svc, [Errors, Rfc], L) ->
  218:     [{P, Stats}] = L,
  219:     true = is_pid(P),
  220:     stats(Svc, Errors, Rfc, lists:sort(Stats));
  221: 
  222: counters(_, _, _, _) ->
  223:     todo.
  224: 
  225: stats(?CLIENT, E, rfc3588, L)
  226:   when E == answer;
  227:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  228:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  229:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  230:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  231:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  232:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  233:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  234:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  235:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  236:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  237:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  238:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  239:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  240:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},1}]
  241:         = L;
  242: 
  243: stats(?SERVER = Svc, E, rfc3588 = RFC, L)
  244:   when E == answer;
  245:        E == answer_3xxx ->
  246:     %% [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  247:     %%  {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  248:     %%  {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  249:     %%  {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  250:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  251:     %%  {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  252:     %%  {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  253:     %%  {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  254:     %%  {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  255:     %%  {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  256:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  257:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  258:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  259:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  260:     %%  {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},1},
  261:     %%  {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  262:     %% = L;
  263:     ?XL("~w(~p, ~w) -> (attempt to) verify answer: "
  264:         "~n   E: ~p"
  265:         "~n   L: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Svc, RFC, E, L]),
  266:     Expected = [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  267:                 {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  268:                 {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  269:                 {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  270:                 {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  271:                 {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  272:                 {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  273:                 {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  274:                 {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  275:                 {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  276:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  277:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  278:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  279:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  280:                 {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},1},
  281:                 {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}],
  282:     case L of
  283:         Expected ->
  284:             ?XL("~w(~w) -> ok", [?FUNCTION_NAME, RFC]),
  285:             L;
  286:         _ ->
  287:             ?XL("~w(~w, ~w) -> wrong: "
  288:                 "~n   L -- Expected: ~p"
  289:                 "~n   Expected -- L: ~p",
  290:                 [?FUNCTION_NAME, Svc, RFC, L -- Expected, Expected -- L]),
  291:             exit({wrong_answer, Svc, E, RFC})
  292:     end;
  293: 
  294: stats(?CLIENT, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  295:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  296:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  297:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  298:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  299:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  300:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  301:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  302:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  303:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  304:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  305:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  306:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  307:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  308:         = L;
  309: 
  310: stats(?SERVER, answer, rfc6733, L) ->
  311:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  312:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  313:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  314:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  315:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  316:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  317:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  318:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  319:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  320:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  321:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  322:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  323:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  324:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  325:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  326:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  327:         = L;
  328: 
  329: stats(?CLIENT, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  330:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},2},
  331:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  332:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  333:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  334:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  335:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  336:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  337:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  338:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  339:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  340:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  341:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  342:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  343:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  344:         = L;
  345: 
  346: stats(?SERVER, answer_3xxx, rfc6733, L) ->
  347:     [{{{unknown,0},send},2},
  348:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  349:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  350:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  351:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  352:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  353:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3001}},1},
  354:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  355:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  356:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  357:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  358:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3008}},2},
  359:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  360:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  361:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  362:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  363:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  364:         = L;
  365: 
  366: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  367:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  368:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  369:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  370:      {{{0,275,0},recv},6},
  371:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  372:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  373:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  374:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  375:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  376:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  377:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},2}]
  378:         = L;
  379: 
  380: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc3588, L) ->
  381:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  382:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  383:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  384:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  385:      {{{0,275,0},send},6},
  386:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  387:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  388:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  389:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  390:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  391:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  392:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  393:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},2},
  394:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  395:         = L;
  396: 
  397: stats(?CLIENT, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  398:     [{{{unknown,0},recv},1},
  399:      {{{0,257,0},recv},1},
  400:      {{{0,257,1},send},1},
  401:      {{{0,275,0},recv},8},
  402:      {{{0,275,1},send},10},
  403:      {{{unknown,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  404:      {{{0,257,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  405:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  406:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  407:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  408:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  409:      {{{0,275,0},recv,{'Result-Code',5999}},1}]
  410:         = L;
  411: 
  412: stats(?SERVER, callback, rfc6733, L) ->
  413:     [{{{unknown,0},send},1},
  414:      {{{unknown,1},recv},1},
  415:      {{{0,257,0},send},1},
  416:      {{{0,257,1},recv},1},
  417:      {{{0,275,0},send},8},
  418:      {{{0,275,1},recv},8},
  419:      {{{unknown,0},send,{'Result-Code',3007}},1},
  420:      {{{unknown,1},recv,error},1},
  421:      {{{0,257,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},1},
  422:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',2001}},2},
  423:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',3999}},1},
  424:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5002}},1},
  425:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5005}},3},
  426:      {{{0,275,0},send,{'Result-Code',5999}},1},
  427:      {{{0,275,1},recv,error},5}]
  428:         = L.
  429: 
  430: %% send_unknown_application/1
  431: %%
  432: %% Send an unknown application that a callback (which shouldn't take
  433: %% place) fails on.
  434: 
  435: %% diameter answers.
  436: send_unknown_application([_,_]) ->
  437:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  438:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3007,
  439:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_APPLICATION
  440:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  441:                                     'AVP' = []}
  442:         = call().
  443: 
  444: %% send_unknown_command/1
  445: %%
  446: %% Send a unknown command that a callback discards.
  447: 
  448: %% handle_request discards the request.
  449: send_unknown_command([callback, _]) ->
  450:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  451:     {error, timeout} = call();
  452: 
  453: %% diameter answers.
  454: send_unknown_command([_,_]) ->
  455:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  456:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3001,
  457:                                                  %% UNSUPPORTED_COMMAND
  458:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  459:                                     'AVP' = []}
  460:         = call().
  461: 
  462: %% send_ok/1
  463: %%
  464: %% Send a correct STR that a callback answers with 5002.
  465: 
  466: %% Callback answers.
  467: send_ok([_,_]) ->
  468:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  469:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5002,  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  470:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  471:                        'AVP' = []}
  472:         = call().
  473: 
  474: %% send_invalid_hdr_bits/1
  475: %%
  476: %% Send a request with an incorrect E-bit that a callback ignores.
  477: 
  478: %% Callback answers.
  479: send_invalid_hdr_bits([callback, _]) ->
  480:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  481:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  482:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  483:                        'AVP' = []}
  484:         = call();
  485: 
  486: %% diameter answers.
  487: send_invalid_hdr_bits([_,_]) ->
  488:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  489:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  490:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  491:                                     'AVP' = []}
  492:         = call().
  493: 
  494: %% send_missing_avp/1
  495: %%
  496: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers.
  497: 
  498: %% diameter answers.
  499: send_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  500:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  501:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  502:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  503:                                     'AVP' = []}
  504:         = call();
  505: 
  506: %% Callback answers.
  507: send_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  508:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  509:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  510:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  511:                        'AVP' = []}
  512:         = call().
  513: 
  514: %% send_ignore_missing_avp/1
  515: %%
  516: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback ignores.
  517: 
  518: %% diameter answers.
  519: send_ignore_missing_avp([answer, rfc6733]) ->
  520:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  521:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  522:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  523:                                     'AVP' = []}
  524:         = call();
  525: 
  526: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  527: send_ignore_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  528:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  529:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  530:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  531:                        'AVP' = []}
  532:         = call().
  533: 
  534: %% send_5xxx_missing_avp/1
  535: %%
  536: %% Send a request with a missing AVP that a callback answers
  537: %% with {answer_message, 5005}.
  538: 
  539: %% RFC 6733 allows 5xxx in an answer-message.
  540: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc6733]) ->
  541:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  542:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  543:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  544:                                     'AVP' = []}
  545:         = call();
  546: 
  547: %% RFC 3588 doesn't: sending answer fails.
  548: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_, rfc3588]) ->
  549:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  550:     {error, timeout} = call();
  551: 
  552: %% Callback answers, ignores the error
  553: send_5xxx_missing_avp([_,_]) ->
  554:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  555:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 2001,  %% SUCCESS
  556:                        'Failed-AVP' = [],
  557:                        'AVP' = []}
  558:         = call().
  559: 
  560: %% send_double_error/1
  561: %%
  562: %% Send a request with both an invalid E-bit and a missing AVP.
  563: 
  564: %% Callback answers with STA.
  565: send_double_error([callback, _]) ->
  566:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  567:     #diameter_base_STA{'Result-Code' = 5005,  %% MISSING_AVP
  568:                        'Failed-AVP' = [_],
  569:                        'AVP' = []}
  570:         = call();
  571: 
  572: %% diameter answers with answer-message.
  573: send_double_error([_,_]) ->
  574:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  575:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3008, %% INVALID_HDR_BITS
  576:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  577:                                     'AVP' = []}
  578:         = call().
  579: 
  580: %% send_3xxx/1
  581: %%
  582: %% Send a request that's answered with a 3xxx result code.
  583: 
  584: %% Callback answers.
  585: send_3xxx([_,_]) ->
  586:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  587:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 3999,
  588:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  589:                                     'AVP' = []}
  590:         = call().
  591: 
  592: %% send_5xxx/1
  593: %%
  594: %% Send a request that's answered with a 5xxx result code.
  595: 
  596: %% Callback answers but fails since 5xxx isn't allowed in an RFC 3588
  597: %% answer-message.
  598: send_5xxx([_, rfc3588]) ->
  599:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  600:     {error, timeout} = call();
  601: 
  602: %% Callback answers.
  603: send_5xxx([_,_]) ->
  604:     ?XL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  605:     #'diameter_base_answer-message'{'Result-Code' = 5999,
  606:                                     'Failed-AVP' = [],
  607:                                     'AVP' = []}
  608:         = call().
  609: 
  610: %% ===========================================================================
  611: 
  612: call() ->
  613:     Name = ?testcase(),
  614:     ?XL("call -> make diameter call with Name: ~p", [Name]),
  615:     %% There is a "bug" in diameter, which can cause this function to return
  616:     %% {error, timeout} even though only a fraction on the time has expired.
  617:     %% This is because the timer has in fact *not* expired. Instead what
  618:     %% has happened is the transport process has died and the selection
  619:     %% of a new transport fails (I think its a race causing the pick_peer
  620:     %% to return the same tranport process), at that error is converted to
  621:     %% a timeout error.
  622:     %% So, if this call returns {error, timeout} but only a fraction of the
  623:     %% time has passed we skip instead!
  624:     Timeout = 5000,
  625:     T1 = ?TS(),
  626:     case diameter:call(?CLIENT,
  627:                        ?DICT,
  628:                        #diameter_base_STR
  629:                        {'Termination-Cause' = ?LOGOUT,
  630:                         'Auth-Application-Id' = ?COMMON,
  631:                         'Class' = [?L(Name)]},
  632:                        [{extra, [Name]}, {timeout, Timeout}]) of
  633:         {error, timeout} = ERROR ->
  634:             T2 = ?TS(),
  635:             TDiff = T2 - T1,
  636:             if
  637:                 TDiff < 100 ->
  638:                     exit({skip, {invalid_timeout, TDiff, Timeout}});
  639:                 true ->
  640:                         ERROR
  641:             end;
  642:         R ->
  643:             R
  644:     end.
  645: 
  646: 
  647: %% ===========================================================================
  648: %% diameter callbacks
  649: 
  650: %% peer_up/3
  651: 
  652: peer_up(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  653:     State.
  654: 
  655: %% peer_down/3
  656: 
  657: peer_down(_SvcName, _Peer, State) ->
  658:     State.
  659: 
  660: %% pick_peer/5
  661: 
  662: pick_peer([Peer], _, ?CLIENT, _State, _Name) ->
  663:     {ok, Peer}.
  664: 
  665: %% prepare_request/4
  666: 
  667: prepare_request(Pkt, ?CLIENT, {_Ref, Caps}, Name) ->
  668:     {send, prepare(Pkt, Caps, Name)}.
  669: 
  670: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_application) ->
  671:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  672:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:8/binary, 0:32, T/binary>>}
  673:         = Pkt
  674:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  675: 
  676:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 23:32, T/binary>>};
  677: 
  678: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_unknown_command) ->
  679:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  680:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:5/binary, 275:24, T/binary>>}
  681:         = Pkt
  682:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  683: 
  684:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H/binary, 572:24, T/binary>>};
  685: 
  686: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  687:   when T == send_ok;
  688:        T == send_3xxx;
  689:        T == send_5xxx ->
  690:     sta(Pkt, Caps);
  691: 
  692: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits) ->
  693:     Req = sta(Pkt0, Caps),
  694:     %% Set the E-bit to force 3008.
  695:     #diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 0:1, T/bitstring>>}
  696:         = Pkt
  697:         = diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt0#diameter_packet{msg = Req}),
  698:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<H:34, 1:1, T/bitstring>>};
  699: 
  700: prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_double_error) ->
  701:     dehost(prepare(Pkt0, Caps, send_invalid_hdr_bits));
  702: 
  703: prepare(Pkt, Caps, T)
  704:   when T == send_missing_avp;
  705:        T == send_ignore_missing_avp;
  706:        T == send_5xxx_missing_avp ->
  707:     Req = sta(Pkt, Caps),
  708:     dehost(diameter_codec:encode(?DICT, Pkt#diameter_packet{msg = Req})).
  709: 
  710: sta(Pkt, Caps) ->
  711:     #diameter_packet{msg = Req}
  712:         = Pkt,
  713:     #diameter_caps{origin_host  = {OH, _},
  714:                    origin_realm = {OR, DR}}
  715:         = Caps,
  716:     Req#diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = diameter:session_id(OH),
  717:                           'Origin-Host' = OH,
  718:                           'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  719:                           'Destination-Realm' = DR}.
  720: 
  721: %% Strip Origin-Host.
  722: dehost(#diameter_packet{bin = Bin} = Pkt) ->
  723:     <<V, Len:24, H:16/binary, T0/binary>>
  724:         = Bin,
  725:     {SessionId, T1} = split_avp(T0),
  726:     {OriginHost, T} = split_avp(T1),
  727:     Delta = size(OriginHost),
  728:     Pkt#diameter_packet{bin = <<V, (Len - Delta):24, H/binary,
  729:                                 SessionId/binary,
  730:                                 T/binary>>}.
  731: 
  732: %% handle_answer/5
  733: 
  734: handle_answer(Pkt, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  735:     Pkt#diameter_packet.msg.
  736: 
  737: %% handle_error/5
  738: 
  739: handle_error(Reason, _Req, ?CLIENT, _Peer, _Name) ->
  740:     {error, Reason}.
  741: 
  742: split_avp(<<_:5/binary, Len:24, _/binary>> = Bin) ->
  743:     L = pad(Len),
  744:     <<Avp:L/binary, T/binary>> = Bin,
  745:     {Avp, T}.
  746: 
  747: pad(N)
  748:   when 0 == N rem 4 ->
  749:     N;
  750: pad(N) ->
  751:     N - (N rem 4) + 4.
  752: 
  753: %% handle_request/3
  754: 
  755: handle_request(#diameter_packet{header = #diameter_header{application_id = 0},
  756:                                 msg = Msg},
  757:                ?SERVER,
  758:                {_, Caps}) ->
  759:     request(Msg, Caps).
  760: 
  761: request(undefined, _) ->  %% unknown command
  762:     discard;
  763: 
  764: request(#diameter_base_STR{'Class' = [Name]} = Req, Caps) ->
  765:     request(?A(Name), Req, Caps).
  766: 
  767: request(send_ok, Req, Caps) ->
  768:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  769:                              errors = [5002]}};  %% UNKNOWN_SESSION_ID
  770: 
  771: request(send_3xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  772:     {answer_message, 3999};
  773: 
  774: request(send_5xxx, _Req, _Caps) ->
  775:     {answer_message, 5999};
  776: 
  777: request(send_invalid_hdr_bits, Req, Caps) ->
  778:     %% Default errors field but a non-answer-message and only 3xxx
  779:     %% errors detected means diameter sets neither Result-Code nor
  780:     %% Failed-AVP.
  781:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps)}};
  782: 
  783: request(T, Req, Caps)
  784:   when T == send_double_error;
  785:        T == send_missing_avp ->
  786:     {reply, answer(Req, Caps)};
  787: 
  788: request(send_ignore_missing_avp, Req, Caps) ->
  789:     {reply, #diameter_packet{msg = answer(Req, Caps),
  790:                              errors = false}};  %% ignore errors
  791: 
  792: request(send_5xxx_missing_avp, _Req, _Caps) ->
  793:     {answer_message, 5005}.  %% MISSING_AVP
  794: 
  795: answer(Req, Caps) ->
  796:     #diameter_base_STR{'Session-Id' = SId}
  797:         = Req,
  798:     #diameter_caps{origin_host = {OH,_},
  799:                    origin_realm = {OR,_}}
  800:         = Caps,
  801:     #diameter_base_STA{'Session-Id' = SId,
  802:                        'Origin-Host' = OH,
  803:                        'Origin-Realm' = OR,
  804:                        'Result-Code' = 2001}.  %% SUCCESS
